boot: cdrom
floppy_bootsig_check: disabled=0
floppya: 1_44=floppyA, status=inserted
# no floppyb
ata0: enabled=1, ioaddr1=0x1f0, ioaddr2=0x3f0, irq=14
ata1: enabled=1, ioaddr1=0x170, ioaddr2=0x370, irq=15
ata2: enabled=0
ata3: enabled=0
ata0-master: type=disk, path="ext2.img", mode=flat, cylinders=4, heads=16, spt=63
ata1-slave: type=cdrom, path=sepples.iso, status=inserted
parport1: enabled=1, file=""
parport2: enabled=0
com1: enabled=1, mode=null, dev=""
com2: enabled=0
com3: enabled=0
com4: enabled=0
usb_uhci: enabled=1
vga: extension=vbe
cpu: count=1, ips=15000000, reset_on_triple_fault=0, ignore_bad_msrs=1
cpuid: mmx=1, sep=1, sse=sse4_2, aes=1, movbe=1, xsave=1

# no gdb stub

# no cmosimage
